start.text: You see a friend isolate themselves during lunch.
start.insight: Sometimes, presence without pressure is more comforting than words.
start.reflect: When have you needed quiet support more than advice?

companion.text: You quietly share the space. After a while, they glance at you with a faint smile.

invite.text: They hesitate but agree to come along. With others around, they slowly relax.
invite.reflect: How do you know when to encourage someone to join in?

talk.text: They open up about feeling overwhelmed. Your listening ear eases their worry.

silence.text: You both sit quietly, sharing a moment of calm.
